anikaratta：anikaratta（pu）
အနိကရတ္တ（ပု）
anikarattaso .
အနိကရတ္တမည်သော မင်း။

Anikaratta：Ruler of Vāranavatī.

He came to Mantāvatī as a suitor for the hand of Sumedhā，but did not succeed in his quest，asSumedhā became a Bhikkhunī after having converted Anikaratta and his retinue. （Anikadatta）.

Thig.v.462-515； ThigA.272f； Ap.ii.512.

anikaratta：＂အနိကရတ္တ（ပု）

အနိကရတ္တမည်သော မင်း။
